value:
Hmph. This castle is far too shabby
for the likes of me. It's an affront to
my refinement!$k$pAh, Goddess... Why must you put me
through such a trial?

I am Oliver, Duke Tanas.$k$pI hope you appreciate that I wouldn't
usually deign to speak to someone as
slovenly as you. Alas...here we are.

What's this? Your face is usually a
gloomy sight, but right now it's
downright grim.$k$pCome now! I'll teach you to smile. I'll
polish you until you gleam, by gods!

Beauty is an abyss we sink into.
Beauty is ephemeral—we can't grasp
it. Beauty is, to put it simply, love.$k$pHm? What's that ghastly look? You
expressed an interest in beauty—I
simply sought to satisfy your curiosity!

I thought this realm so dreary...until I
spotted a feathered angel. Tell me,
what's that lass's name?

Strangely enough, it seems someone
is concerned with your well-being. It's
$Nf.

It seems I've the potential to
become even more lustrous.

Though most lack the refinement
to see it, I'm slightly more alluring.

Are even the gods jealous of my
perfection? This must be a trial!

Overflowing with power...I am
terrible in my beauty!

I am a member of the Begnion
Senate. To speak my name is to
call on my legendary beauty and wit!$k$pI am Oliver!

I've noticed something. Lately,
you're always scowling.$k$pThis is not only unsightly—it is
pointless. Tedious, even.$k$pBy the gods, what do you think you
might accomplish by worrying about
matters you cannot control?$k$pYou have but one life, and one
chance to shine!$k$pWe both know that you are,
essentially, ordinary. What you spend
your time on is of little consequence.$k$pBearing that in mind, you must simply
do what you can and only then
consider the result. Get on with it!$k$pTroubles reside in the mind, and
beauty is found in a smile—that's
the saying.$k$pThose who truly grasp their fates can
smile with ease. Learn well, and you'd
be less unpleasant to look upon.$k$pHo! I see that grin! It looks as though
my words have resounded in your
soul.$k$pI hope that you will continue to find
my counsel so scintillating for many a
year to come!
ほぁっ
おぉ！
うああっ！
Someone, please help me!
Stunning, aren't I?
How frightening.
Admire my poise!
This is true beauty!
Beauty...is fleeting...
ほほ
I have seen death's vistas and returned an even wiser, more exquisite man!
I cannot blame you for wanting to touch something so alluring as myself.
Blessed with such radiance, I have no foes... Only inferiors!
You are permitted to fully admire the beauty called Oliver.
A true guardian of beauty stands with those who are beautiful.
Hmmm... It's like my brain is in a fog. I can never remember the ugly ones.
You are my jewel... I will not allow you to die.
Don't you worry.
Let's tread carefully.
Flawless.
